author: nvhieu
title: Automated funding catalyst projects
description: The Catalyst support team is funding proposals manually, This mechanism requires a lot of time and effort
solution: Our proposal aims to use smart contract for Catalyst funding. Dapp is designed to release ADA per certain period of time with conditions
experience: We are SPO, The member of Plutus Pioneer Program,Blockchain tech-savvies,Eastern Townhall moderators/co-hosts.
